javadoc: Manages the main menu bar on the main frame.

methods.name: addAction
methods.comment: Adds an action to the menu.

methods.javadoc:
Removes an action from the menu.
@param action the action to be removed.
methods.name: removeAction
methods.comment: Removes an action from the menu.

methods.javadoc: Releases all resources and makes this object unusable.
methods.name: dispose
methods.comment: Releases all resources and makes this object unusable.

methods.javadoc: Returns a JMenuBar for all the actions.
methods.name: getMenuBar
methods.comment: Returns a JMenuBar for all the actions.

methods.name: menuGroupChanged
methods.comment: Handles changes to the Menu Group

params.name: menuPath
params.comment: the menu path whose group changed.

params.name: group
params.comment: the new group for the given menuPath.

name: MenuBarManager
comment: Manages the main menu bar on the main frame.
